list-item.p: Cytokines seem to play an essential role in both COVID-19 and TB, their plasma level being associated with disease's severity.
Immune system hyperreaction could explain a more unfortunate outcome in people 25â€“35 years old.
Although there is limited data on MTB and COVID-19 coinfection, one could reasonably presume that their coexistence might have a more severe evolution for the patient.
